name: Ultimus
description:
Introducing Ultimus: A Vision of First-Person Shooters, circa 1965.

Step into a world where the past meets the future, where cool and unique graphics blend seamlessly with heart-pounding 1v1 duels in both single-player and multiplayer modes. Ultimus isn't just a game; it's the ultimate embodiment of competitive action in the world of first-person shooters. Get ready to experience the game that redefines the genre and propels you into a new era of gaming excitement.
